DOC.brief_summary: Research predictive factors of success or failure of a sedation with Dexmedetomidine in ICU
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors of Failure or Success of Sedation With Dexmedetomidine in ICU
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective clinical study in ICU with sedated ventilated patients with dexmedetomidine, establishing incidence of success, failure of moderate sedation or failure of dexmedetomidine, to evaluate the effectiveness of this drug sedation in moderate sedation
DOC.criteria: Adult patients ventilated requiring sedation in ICU with RASS objective more than 2 contraindication: intracranial lesion, hepatic failure pregnancy
